title: A preparatiue to mariage The summe whereof was spoken at a contract, and inlarged after. Whereunto is annexed a treatise of the Lords Supper, and another of vsurie. By Henrie Smith.
author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
publisher: By Thomas Orwin for Thomas Man, dwelling in Paternoster row at the signe of the Talbot,
notes: Signatures: A-H, A-H I² , A²  B-E F⁴.
Part 2 has a separate title page, with same imprint, reading: A treatise of the Lords Supper, in two sermons.
Part 3 has a separate title page, with same imprint, reading: The examination of vsurie, in two sermons. Taken by characterie, and after examined.
Part 1 paginated; all three parts have separate signatures.
Appears at reel 939, (Folger Shakespeare Library copy, part 3 only) and at reel 1395, #5 (Bodleian Library copy).
Item at reel 939:14 was formerly STC 22661.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library and the Folger Shakespeare Library (part 3 only).
